snippet: A judge in Rotterdam has ordered the artist Danh Vo to complete an art installation for Mr. Kreuk, a Dutch collector, or face daily fines.
abstract: Artist Danh Vo is battling collector Bert Kreuk in Dutch court over art installation that Kreuk expected to buy when completed, but Vo believed was loan; courts so far have ruled in Kreuk's favor, demanding that Vo complete installation within one year; conflict highlights clash between wealthy art collectors and emerging artists in skyrocketing art market.
lead_paragraph: A judge in Rotterdam has ordered the artist Danh Vo to complete an art installation for Mr. Kreuk, a Dutch collector, or face daily fines.

headline.main: Danh Vo and Bert Kreuk’s Legal Battle Pits Artist Against Collector
headline.print_headline: The Rising Artist Versus the Collector
